identity.name: E1
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Industrial Precision with Luxury Elegance
Emotion First: Trust, Clarity, and Innovation
Content is King: Every pixel serves the user's goal (Calculate, Book, Track)
Zoom In: Focus on the texture and quality of the glass
Negative Space: Let the content breathe, like a clean glass pane

rules: Overlines must be Uppercase + tracking-widest + text-xs
Line height: leading-none for headers, leading-relaxed for body

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-white hover:bg-primary/90 shadow-lg hover:shadow-xl transition-all duration-300 rounded-lg px-8 py-3 font-semibold tracking-wide
buttons.secondary: bg-white text-slate-900 border border-slate-200 hover:bg-slate-50 hover:border-slate-300 transition-all duration-300 rounded-lg px-8 py-3 font-medium
buttons.ghost: text-slate-600 hover:text-primary hover:bg-primary/5 transition-colors rounded-lg px-4 py-2

cards.feature: group relative overflow-hidden rounded-2xl bg-white dark:bg-slate-900 border border-slate-100 dark:border-slate-800 hover:border-cyan-500/50 transition-all duration-500 hover:shadow-2xl hover:-translate-y-1
cards.product: aspect-[4/5] relative overflow-hidden rounded-xl bg-slate-100 dark:bg-slate-800 group

inputs.default: h-12 rounded-lg border-slate-200 bg-white px-4 text-slate-900 placeholder:text-slate-400 focus:border-cyan-500 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-cyan-500/20 transition-all

hero.alt: Modern glass skyscraper facade reflecting sky

icons.usage: Use specific icons for industries (Building, HardHat, Ruler, Truck)

universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable
All interactive elements MUST include data-testid attribute
instructions_to_main_agent: You are building a Hybrid App (Marketing + SaaS). The Marketing side (Home, About, Services) should feel like a luxury architectural portfolio. The SaaS side (Calculator, Dashboard) should feel like a precision tool (Linear/Linear-like). Use the 'Glassmorphism' visual enhancer heavily in the Marketing side to reinforce the brand product.
